name: authenticator-master
description:
O-Auth

How to run the Website ?

Either clone the repository and run on your local host

Brief Intro about the Website

O-Auth is a Authentication website made using NodeJS, MongoDB and vanilla JavaScript.
This website can work as a starter code for any website.
You can create your account either by signing up via mailId or by using Google Authentication
We can also sign in using both these authenticaions.

Flow of Website :

Home Page

The home page is very basic and simple you have a navbar on top with home page button signin/ signup buttons
This page acts as the landing page.

Sign Up Page

This page is where a user can create his or her account either with the mailID or bby using google authentication.

Sign In Page

This page is where a user can sign in to his or her account either with the mailID or bby using google authentication.

This page also have a option to forgot password where a user can enter his mail id and the password is sent to their Gmail account.

Profile Page

This page is shown only when the user is logged in.

This page consists of two buttons.

1.SignOut Button - To sign out the current user.
2.Change Password Button-A user can change the current password if he wants to do so.
